abstract: Basketball Hall of Famer Jerry West, who played his entire professional career for Los Angeles Lakers, questions the price of success in his new autobiography West by West: My Charmed, Tormented Life.
snippet: In a new autobiography, the basketball Hall of Famer Jerry West goes past the point where cheers fade and sports books end, and asks, What is it all worth?
lead_paragraph: In a new autobiography, the basketball Hall of Famer Jerry West goes past the point where cheers fade and sports books end, and asks, What is it all worth?

headline.main: Jerry West Looks Deep Into the Mirror
headline.print_headline: West Provides Unsparing Look At Man Behind the Silhouette
headline.seo: In ‘West by West,’ Jerry West Looks Deep Into the Mirror
